message:
‼️‼️‼️
A pregnant woman at Taqwa Specialised Hospital (15 New Eskaton Road, Mogbazar Mor, above Mina Bazaar) is in critical condition and requires B-negative blood immediately to survive.

If anyone willing to donate B-negative blood, please contact urgently at +8801914220333.
location: Taqwa Specialised Hospital (15 New Eskaton Road, Mogbazar Mor, above Mina Bazaar)
